root.name: Coropata
root.description: Coropata - detailsÂ - guide a blue-haired girl to a level's goal by placing items down that the girl will interact with- you do not control the girl directly- use logs/platforms to stop the girl from falling into pits- other included objects: basketballs, fans and more- the girl will interact with items differently depending on her mood- you can manage the main character's mood- 128 levels in the game, with more available for download
